name: ​ContentCapability​Input

fields.name: description
fields.description: Description of the file to be uploaded.

fields.name: sharingOption
fields.description: Sharing option of the file. Values are: Allowed—Resharing of the file is allowed. Restricted—Resharing of the file is restricted.

fields.name: title
fields.description: Title of the file. This value is used as the file name for new content. For example, if the title is My Title, and the file is a .txt file, the file name is My Title.txt.

description: Attach or update a file on a comment. Use this class to attach a new file or update a file that has already been uploaded to Salesforce.
